title: Video: Child Ivory – Afterglow
body:
I’m a sucker for any Beach House influenced sound, and Utah duo **Child Ivory** absolutely nail it on their latest track, _Afterglow_.

Set against a slightly cliched, yet gorgeously graded video, it’s a real statement of intent. Check it out below.
